name: Action Jackson Pollock
description:
Alright painters!  Time to "easel" on in and show us your best!  Don't let those supplies stop you before you create your masterpiece.  We want to see your best mess and carnage to earn the best price possible for your artwork! 

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Run - Shift

Shoot - Space or primary mouse button

Pause - ESC

Go out there and give us your masterpiece!

Lead Programmer - Gorethumb

Music and SFX - tornado cub

Lead Designer - Nightmare
